meanings.definition: Directed or sent in the wrong direction.
meanings.sent1: The misdirected letter ended up at the wrong house.
meanings.sent2: The misdirected package was delivered to the incorrect address.
meanings.sent3: The misdirected cat thought the fish was in the wrong bowl.
meanings.sent4: His misdirected efforts led him further away from his goal.
meanings.sent5: The misdirected arrow missed the target completely.

meanings.definition: Guided or managed poorly or incorrectly.
meanings.sent1: The misdirected instructions confused the students.
meanings.sent2: Her misdirected decisions caused chaos in the company.
meanings.sent3: The misdirected GPS led them to a dead-end road.
meanings.sent5: The misdirected efforts resulted in a complete mess.
